thread.title: Putin improves hockey stats with goal on ice

title: Putin improves hockey stats with goal on ice
text:
Putin improves hockey stats with goal on ice 10:23am BST - 02:24
VIDEO SHOWS: RUSSIAN PRESIDENT VLADIMIR PUTIN SKATES ON ICE, WELCOMES PLAYERS OF BOTH TEAMS / PUTIN AND RUSSIAN DEFENCE MINISTER SERGEI SHOIGU AND OTHERS PLAYING ICE HOCKEY SHOTLIST ONLY. COMPLETE ▲ Hide Transcript ▶ View Transcript
